text: Thomas Jacob Hilfiger (born March 24, 1951) "Profile: Tommy Hilfiger", Hello magazine is an American fashion designer. He is the founder of the lifestyle brand Tommy Hilfiger Corporation. Hilfiger began his business career at the age of 18. He moved to New York City in his early 20s. ==References== ==Other websites== * Official website Category:1951 births Category:Living people Category:American fashion designers Category:Businesspeople from New York (state) Category:People from Elmira, New York
title: Tommy Hilfiger
